unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.details: Credentials are not available. Please log in again.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.details: You do not have the permission for this action. Please contact the administrator for further assistance.

serviceunavailable.title: Service is offline
serviceunavailable.details: Service is offline. Please contact Administrator.

badgateway.title: Bad Gateway
badgateway.details: Received an invalid response from upstream server.
